Hi,

it seems as if the forum does not send e-mails such as account-confirmation- or password-forgotten-mails.

I requested a password-forgotten-mail at least 10 times in the last few days, but none got through (not even in the spam-folder). I also just registered a new account (this one) with another address from a different mail-provider, and got no account-confirmation mail.
We're aware of the problem and are working to resolve it
